channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery

channel.title: Fly My Pepeha
channel.desc: NEW: Tamariki series offering an immersive journey into the heart of the rich landscapes of Aotearoa and M?ori history. Using drone technology, viewers will explore diverse landscapes and traditions.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Molly Of Denali
channel.desc: NEW: The daily adventures of 10-year-old Alaska native Molly Mabray, her family, her dog Suki and her friends Tooey and Trini.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? Kapa Haka Tuarua o Aotearoa 2024

channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025

channel.title: Fresh 2025

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Tamariki learn well-known waiata and haka from Ng? Puna o Waiorea, Te Wharekura o Hoani Waititi Marae and Te Wharekura o R?kaumangamanga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wild City
channel.desc: David Attenborough narrates this special exploration of Singapore's forests. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Matau Bros Gone Fishing
channel.desc: A lifestyle series that follows hard-case M?ori anglers, Matene, Dazza and Jeff Cleave, as they fish for knowledge and food for the table. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?iho Riding On
channel.desc: Lizzie Rangihuna is back to explore the nations back country and reveal the great stories from the paddock, meeting the people making a difference in their communities through their Hoiho. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0 - 6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka? live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Wai and Mihi collect the eels. Mihi is worried about being late to the feast, but Wai doesn?t care. Wai and Mihi and Nga?ru make their way back to the village but come across a dead huia. They don?t notice a piece of bread that has been nibbled by the bird.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Mihi is worried about missing out on delicious Kumara! Wai starts to feel uneasy as if something is wrong. She asks Mihi if she can hear drumming. Suddenly, the Farmers appear! The girls hide and watch as they leave the village. It's too early for the feast to be finished.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Siblings Eraia and Lahaina Kiel teach basic skills in poi, haka and other traditional M?ori performing arts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: People came from all over ?tiria to help build the Piritaha Homestead, a humble farmhouse built in the 1900s using kauri milled from their own whenua. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachies Kitchen
channel.desc: Chef Sachie Nomura travels to the Coromandel to meet local seaweed harvesters AgriSea, the Opito Bay Salt Company and the creators of Awildian Gin. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Drawing Board
channel.desc: Tere Insley, Elisapeta Heta & Raukura Turei are wahine toa incorporating an indigenous aesthetic which considers tikanga and m?tauranga M?ori, shaping spaces through a M?ori lens. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Treaty Road
channel.desc: NEW: As the buffalo near extinction, the Plains Indigenous People struggle to survive, but they add a medicine chest clause to Treaty 6 to try to protect their health. The Indian Act is pushed through and undermines any rights enshrined in the treaties.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: NEW: On his birthday, P?p? H?ne drives the wh?nau to Cape Reinga, where the tamariki lead out the Toit? te Tiriti march.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Monolith
channel.desc: PREMIERE: A headstrong journalist whose investigative podcast uncovers a strange artifact, an alien conspiracy, and the lies at the heart of her own story.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.title: Kori Club

channel.title: T?hura

channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Kura is furious that they have lost the godstick again and tries her best to stop her sister and Josh from making a deal with Hikuroa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After crashing down into a valley of lava streams, Kura is determined to find a way back up the cliff and get their godstick back from. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After a narrow escape, Kura realises she has no choice and sets off to find a way through the treacherous lava streams towards the misty maunga. (R).

channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai and Nan are approached by Grace who offers to buy the farm. (R).

channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Nan falls sick so Marama and N?kau return to look after Tai and the farm. (R).

channel.title: West Coasters
channel.desc: The enduring struggle for pounamu has shaped the narrative of West Coast M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: 1.5 Degrees
channel.desc: Exploring the impact of climate change from the perspective of Rangatahi M?ori. Pania wants to share her passion for environmental justice and inspire other rangatahi to take action. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kids Dont Come With A Manual
channel.desc: Sarah and Alexi struggle with their 3 year old daughter whose screaming is causing distress within the wh?nau. They are also looking for ways to stay connected to their eldest son. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: She Shears
channel.desc: In the gruelling world of competitive sheep shearing there is no women's section. A story of passion, purpose and determination and five women for whom shearing is not just a job. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. We visit K?"?anapali Beach Hotel in Maui, Kohutapu Lodge and Tribal Tours in the Bay of plenty. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).
